member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.InvertEffect
member.summary: Inverts the colors of an image.

remarks.p: Effect inputs and outputs are assumed to be in premultiplied alpha format, but this effect operates internally on straight alpha data, so its input values will be unpremultiplied, then the invert applied, and finally the result converted back to premultiplied format.
